column1: A photographer is going on a world-wide journey. He wants to photograph places and animals around the world.
column2: Help him get to New Zealand to take pictures of penguins.
column4: Help him get to China to take a picture of the Great Wall of China.
column6: Help him get to the United States to take a picture of the Golden Gate Bridge.
column8: Help him get to France to take a picture of the Eiffel Tower.
column10: Help him get to Brazil to take a picture of the Amazon River.
column12: Help him get to Egypt to take a picture of the Great Pyramids.
column14: Help him get to Australia to take a picture of the Sydney Opera House.
column16: Help him get to the Czech Republic to take a picture of the Charles Bridge.

column1: A fisher wants to go fishing.
column2: The fisher needs wood to build his fishing pole. He knows that Canada is the world leader in wood exports exporting 31 billion kilograms of wood per year. Find Canada!
column4: The fisher needs aluminum to build his boat. Help him find Norway a leading exporter of aluminum.
column6: Help the fisher get to Italy to begin fishing in the mediterranean sea.

column1: A food critic wants to try famous foods from all over the world.
column2: Help her get to Spain to get Paella.
column4: Help her find Croatia to get kremnita (cream cake).
column6: Help her find Mexico for some enchiladas.
column8: Help her find South Africa for bobotie.
column10: Help her find Venezuela for Arepas.
column12: Help her find Turkey for menemen.
column14: Help her find Fiji for some Fiji water.

column1: A mountain climber wants to climb the tallest mountains in the world.
column2: Help her get to Nepal to climb Mount Everest.
column4: Help her get to Pakistan to climb K2.
column6: Help her get to Tanzania to climb Mount Kilimanjaro.
column8: Help her get to Argentina to climb Mount Aconcagua.
column10: Help her get to Russia to climb Mount Elbrus.
column12: Help her get to Georgia to climb Shkhara.
column14: Help her get to Indonesia to climb Puncak Jaya.
column16: Help her get to Kenya to climb Mount Kenya.

column1: You are a detective and you have been asked to find a criminal somewhere in the world.
column2: The criminal might be hiding in the Amazon rain forest. Go to Peru to find out.
column4: Go to Greece to see if the criminal is hiding behind the columns.
column6: Maybe the criminal is hiding in the Sahara desert. Go check in Algeria.
column8: There have been reports of a criminal hiding in the Taj Mahal. Go to India to catch the criminal.
column10: The criminal may be relaxing on the beach in Cuba. Go check.
column12: The criminal is hiding at the music festival in Sweden. Go catch him!
column14: The criminal thinks he is being clever by hiding in salt mines in Ghana. Go foil his plan!

column1: A group of animal enthusiasts are on a mission to see all the rarest animals in the world. They need your help finding all of the countries.
column2: Help them get to Panama to see the pygmy three-toed sloth.
column4: Help them get to Columbia to see the Red Crested Tree Rat.
column6: Help them get to Ukraine to see the Angel Shark in the Black Sea.
column8: Help them get to Madagascar to see the Ploughshare Tortoise.
column10: Help them get to Morocco to see the Bald Ibis.
column12: Help them get to Ecuador to see the Rio Pescado Stubfoot Toad.
column14: Help them get to Cote d'Ivoire to see the Roloway Monkey.
column16: Help them get to Jamaica to see the Rock Iguana.
column18: Help them get to Iran to see the Luristan Newt.
column20: Help them get to Laos to see the Rare Saola.
column22: Help them get to Vietnam to see the Red River Giant Softshell Turtle.
column24: Help them get to Somalia to see the Hirola.
column26: Help them get to Malaysia to see the Rare Sumatran Rhino.

column1: A group of tourists are on a mission to try all the rarest fruits in the world. They need your help finding all of the countries.
column2: Help them get to Thailand to try Durian.
column4: Help them get to Bangladesh to try Jackfruit.
column6: Help them get to Bolivia to try Cherimoya.
column8: Help them get to Botswana to try Kiwano (Horned Melon).
column10: Help them get to North Korea to try Korean Melon.
column12: Help them get to Paraguay to try Passion Fruit.
column14: Help them get to Uruguay to try Feijoa.
column16: Help them get to Chile to try Tamarillo.

column1: A swimmer is training for the Olympics as he is looking for a lake to swim in. He needs to find the locations of the top ten biggest lakes in the world.
column2: Help him find Turkmenistan so he can swim in the Caspian Sea.
column4: Help him find Uganda so he can swim in Lake Victoria.
column6: Help him find Zambia so he can swim in Lake Tanganyika.
column8: Help him find Mozambique so he can swim in Lake Malawi.
column10: Help him find Kazakhstan so he can swim in lake Balkhash.
column12: Help him find Nicaragua so he can swim in Lake Nicaragua.
column14: Help him find Ethiopia so he can swim in Lake Turkana.
column16: Help him find Kyrgyzstan so he can swim in Lake Issyk-Kul.

column1: An architect is trying to beat the record for the world's tallest building. She needs your help finding the tallest buildings in the world for inspiration.
column2: Help her get to the United Arab Emirates to see Burj Khalifa.
column4: Help her get to Saudi Arabia to see the Makkah Royal Clock Tower.
column6: Help her get to South Korea to see the Lotte World Tower.
column8: Help her get to Taiwan to see Taipei 101.

column1: A group of thrill seekers wants to go to amusement parks around the world. They need your help to find all the countries.
column2: Help them get to Germany to visit Europa-Park.
column4: Help them get to Denmark to visit Tivoli Gardens.
column6: Help them get to Portugal to visit Zoomarine Algarve.
column8: Help them get to the Netherlands to visit Efteling.
column10: Help them get to Japan to visit Tokyo Disneyland.
